item.title: Numerology Horoscope Today: Predictions for December 28, 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Numerology Horoscope Today: Predictions for December 28, 2024

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Today’s numerology readings provide personalized advice for individuals based on their birthdates, highlighting the significance of careful decision-making, relationship management, and personal expression.

  • Number 1: Caution in financial decisions; focus on saving.
  • Number 2: Balance ambition with sensitivity to others.
  • Number 3: Opportunity to express creativity and influence others.
  • Number 4: Importance of emotional expression for relationship building.
  • Number 5: Embrace transitional chaos for positive change.
  • Number 6: Engage in meaningful discussions respectfully.
  • Number 7: Exercise caution with sensitive information.
  • Number 8: Take initiative in group activities to lead effectively.
  • Number 9: Trust your judgment over seeking approval from others.
“Trust in the work already done. Don’t strive for approval; rather, take confident actions on your own.”

This numerology horoscope emphasizes both personal insight and the importance of influencing relationships positively.

item.title: ‘Baby John’ box office collection Day 3: Varun Dhawan starrer misses Rs 20 crore mark as collections fall - TOI Etimes
item.description:
‘Baby John’ Box Office Collection Day 3: Varun Dhawan Starrer Misses Rs 20 Crore Mark

Date: [Date not provided] Source: [Source not provided]

Despite an initial positive reception, Varun Dhawan's latest film 'Baby John' has seen a significant drop in box office collections, raising concerns about its overall performance.

  • Day 3 collections fell to Rs 3.65 crore.
  • The total earnings have not yet reached the Rs 20 crore milestone.
  • Analysts are predicting a difficult path ahead for the film in theaters.

item.title: Zayed Khan's Net Worth: Shah Rukh Khan's Main Hoon Na Co-Star Richer Than Prabhas, Ranbir Kapoor And Ram Ch - News18
item.description:
Zayed Khan's Net Worth: Shah Rukh Khan's Co-Star Surpasses Bollywood Rivals

Date: December 28, 2024

Source: ET Now

Zayed Khan, who rose to fame in Bollywood known for his role in Main Hoon Na, has transitioned into business, amassing a net worth of approximately Rs 1,500 crore, surpassing many of his contemporaries.

  • Zayed Khan debuted in Bollywood at 22 with Chura Liyaa Hai Tumne.
  • He became popular with his role in Main Hoon Na alongside Shah Rukh Khan.
  • His wealth reportedly exceeds that of Ranbir Kapoor (Rs 550 crore), Prabhas (Rs 400 crore), Allu Arjun (Rs 350 crore), and Ram Charan (Rs 1,300 crore).
  • Zayed now focuses on investments in startups, leveraging his business management education.
  • He humorously dismissed inquiries about his net worth during an interview.
“Live within your means.” - Zayed Khan

This impressive financial growth illustrates how Zayed Khan has successfully leveraged his fame into lucrative business ventures, positioning him as a wealthier figure in Bollywood.

item.title: Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024: Check here Astrological predictions for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024

Published On: Dec 28, 2024

Published By: Ayush Bisht

Find out your daily astrological predictions for love, health, money, and career for all zodiac signs. This horoscope provides insights into how different signs will navigate the day.

  • Aries: Moderate day; avoid risks.
  • Taurus: Professional excellence and deepened relationships.
  • Gemini: Hard work will yield positive outcomes.
  • Cancer: Positive atmosphere, smooth progress in personal matters.
  • Leo: Seek harmony at home, avoid hasty decisions.
  • Virgo: Networking benefits, businesses thrive.
  • Libra: Quality family time, improved living standards.
  • Scorpio: Enhance reputation through cooperation.
  • Sagittarius: Patience in planning, respect traditions.
  • Capricorn: Focus on financial goals, impactful communications.
  • Aquarius: Positive career developments and support from power.
  • Pisces: Successful long-term plans and enhanced spirituality.

item.title: WWE SmackDown Results – 12/27/24 (Chelsea Green Championship celebration) - Wrestleview.com
item.description:
WWE SmackDown Results – December 27, 2024

Date: December 27, 2024
Source: Wrestleview.com

The latest episode of WWE SmackDown featured significant developments in several ongoing storylines, including Chelsea Green's Championship celebration and a heated match featuring top female talents.

  • Bianca Belair, Naomi, and Bayley defeated Tiffany Stratton, Nia Jax, and Candice LeRae.
  • Braun Strowman emerged victorious against Austin Theory.
  • The Street Profits secured a win over Garza and Humberto.
  • Chelsea Green celebrated as the longest reigning WWE Women’s United States Champion, facing off with Michin who interrupted her celebration.
  • Nick Aldis issued a stern warning to Kevin Owens regarding the Winged Eagle Championship.
“A fun opening match. Tiffany Stratton is getting the biggest reaction and her cash in is going to be one of the biggest pops of the year.” — Wrestleview.com

The episode set up exciting future matchups and highlighted ongoing rivalries within WWE.

item.title: Spoiler: Planned Match and Segment Revealed for 12/27 WWE SmackDown - Ringside News
item.description:
Planned Match and Segment Revealed for 12/27 WWE SmackDown

Date: December 27, 2024

Source: Ringside News

WWE SmackDown is gearing up for its final episode of 2024, promising exciting developments as it transitions to a new three-hour format. Fans can look forward to a title celebration and a major six-woman tag team match.

  • Chelsea Green will celebrate her victory as the new Women’s United States Champion.
  • A six-woman tag team match will feature Naomi and Bianca Belair teaming with Bayley against Nia Jax, Tiffany Stratton, and Candice LeRae.
  • The episode aims to build anticipation for 2025 as stories unfold.
“What are you most excited about for SmackDown’s final episode of 2024?”

As the year closes, fans are eager for what’s to come in 2025, with the final episode promising a taste of the future.

item.title: Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 advices trying luck in stock - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 to know your astrological predictions.

Date: Dec 28, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

  • New love and better professional opportunities are highlighted today.
  • Productivity at work is a focus, with multiple chances for advancement.
  • Financial issues are minor but may arise later in the day; caution is advised in money matters.
  • A love horoscope indicates minor ego-related issues may occur but won’t damage relationships.
  • Career aspects are promising, with chances for IT and business professionals to make abroad connections.
“The inflow of money will not be as good as you expected.”

In conclusion, while today is filled with positive opportunities, maintaining financial caution will be crucial for a smooth experience.

item.title: Solo Leveling Season 2 Episode 1: Exact release date, time and more - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Solo Leveling Season 2 Episode 1: Exact Release Date, Time, and More

Date: Dec 28, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The highly anticipated return of Solo Leveling is finally here, as Season 2 kicks off with its first episode. After a thrilling and action-packed Season 1, fans have been eagerly awaiting the continuation of Jinwoo’s journey.

  • Release date: January 5, 2025 (JST); early release on January 4 for international fans.
  • Available streaming platforms include Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, Netflix, and Crunchyroll.
  • New season covers arcs such as the Red Gate Arc and Jeju Island Arc.
"The new season of Solo Leveling opens the door to various arcs it could cover..."

Fans can expect the first episode to cover events from Chapter 46 of the Manhwa, introducing new characters and situations.

item.title: Deepika Padukone shares pic from daughter Dua's first Christmas with Ranveer Singh; fans notice cute Raha - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Deepika Padukone Celebrates Daughter Dua's First Christmas with Ranveer Singh

Publication Date: December 25, 2023 Source: Times of India

Bollywood couple Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh shared a glimpse of their intimate Christmas celebrations, showcasing a customized ornament symbolizing their family unity.

  • The ornament featured the names "Ranveer, Deepika, and Dua" in gold script.
  • Deepika captioned the photo, "My heart is full," attracting thousands of likes and comments from fans.
  • Fans have noted the resemblance to another star-kid, Raha Kapoor's Christmas post from the previous year.
  • The Padukone-Singh family celebrated Christmas privately, keeping Dua's face hidden from the media.
  • Deepika is on maternity leave and is expected to start filming 'The Intern' Hindi remake soon.
“My heart is full.” - Deepika Padukone

This heartwarming celebration has delighted fans and emphasizes the couple's commitment to their family's privacy while also sharing their joy with followers.

item.title: Govinda's wife Sunita Ahuja says 'we use abusive language with each other': 'Aaj tak bhi nahi lagta ki hu - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Govinda's wife Sunita Ahuja says 'we use abusive language with each other': 'Aaj tak bhi nahi lagta ki hum husband-wife hai'

Publication Date: [Not available] Source: Times of India

Sunita Ahuja opened up about her unconventional relationship with her husband Govinda in a candid interview, sharing humorous insights about their bond.

  • Sunita revealed, “Aaj tak bhi nhi lagta ki hum husband-wife hai.”
  • She humorously stated that they use abusive language with each other, saying, “Galiya galoch chalti hai humari.”
  • Sunita reminisced about how she adapted to Govinda's family preferences by switching from miniskirts to sarees.
  • Govinda recently celebrated his 61st birthday with fans.
  • A previous incident involved Govinda accidentally shooting himself in the leg, for which he later provided a detailed account.
“I still can't believe you're my husband.” - Sunita Ahuja

This interview sheds light on the playful and unconventional dynamics of their relationship, showcasing how they express love in unique ways.

item.title: Twinkle Khanna opens up on Akshay Kumar's reaction when she decided to move to UK with their daughter Nit - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Twinkle Khanna opens up on Akshay Kumar's reaction when she decided to move to UK with their daughter Nitara to study further: 'Even if he was not fine, I would have...'

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

In a candid revelation, Twinkle Khanna shared her plans of moving to the UK with their daughter Nitara for further studies, discussing her husband Akshay Kumar's supportive reaction.

  • Twinkle Khanna plans to pursue further studies in the UK with her daughter Nitara.
  • She expressed that Akshay Kumar would support her decision regardless of his feelings.
  • This move is seen as a step towards personal growth for Khanna.
“Even if he was not fine, I would have…” - Twinkle Khanna on Akshay’s reaction.

Twinkle's move is a significant one that highlights the importance of education and personal aspirations alongside family responsibilities.

item.title: Twinkle Khanna opens up on people comparing her son and daughter's different skin colours: I decided I'm - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Twinkle Khanna opens up on people comparing her son and daughter's different skin colours: I decided I'm going to make sure she believes she is wonderful

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Not specified

In a heartfelt statement, actress and author Twinkle Khanna discusses the societal pressures and comparisons regarding the skin colors of her children and emphasizes the importance of self-worth and acceptance.

  • Khanna is determined to instill confidence in her daughter despite societal biases.
  • She addresses the issue of colorism and its impact on children.
  • Khanna's approach focuses on promoting self-love and acceptance.
“I decided I'm going to make sure she believes she is wonderful.”

This message from Khanna serves as a reminder of the importance of addressing colorism and fostering self-acceptance in children.

item.title: Rapper OG Maco dies at 32 two weeks after suffering a self-inflicted gunshot wound - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Rapper OG Maco dies at 32 after self-inflicted gunshot wound, surrounded by family in hospital.

Date: Dec 28, 2024 12:42 AM IST | Source: Hindustan Times

Rapper OG Maco has died at the age of 32, two weeks after a self-inflicted gunshot wound. He was surrounded by family at a Los Angeles hospital when he passed away, according to reports.

  • OG Maco was known for his song “U Guessed It.”
  • His family shared a heartfelt statement on X, reflecting on his life and impact.
  • Maco had been admitted to the hospital on December 12 due to the gunshot wound.
  • He was found unresponsive at his home after a gunshot was reported by a neighbor.
  • The rapper was in a coma and his condition deteriorated over the following days.
“Through his music, passion, and unwavering spirit, he touched so many lives and left a lasting impact.” – Family Statement

The loss of OG Maco is felt deeply by fans and loved ones alike, as they remember his extraordinary life and the influence he had on many.

item.title: ‘Salman Bhai gets upset if you miss his 2:30 am call,' reveals Mika Singh - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Mika Singh Shares Late-Night Call Anecdote About Salman Khan

Publication Date: N/A Source: The Times of India

Mika Singh shares a light-hearted story about Bollywood superstar Salman Khan's late-night calling habits.

  • Mika Singh discusses Salman Khan's tendency to call friends around 2:30 a.m.
  • Missing a call can upset Salman, who doesn't consider if the recipient is asleep.
  • The anecdote details a late-night call about music for 'Kick'.
  • Mika's rendition of a song was ultimately chosen over Salman's version.
  • Salman Khan is preparing for his upcoming film 'Sikandar'.
“Salman Bhai is like an elder brother. If you miss his 2:30 or 3 a.m. call, he gets upset. He doesn’t think about whether the other person might be sleeping.”

This humorous insight into Salman Khan's personality showcases his commitment to his work and his unique relationship with Mika Singh.
